description: Verify that the User Management page loads correctly with admin authentication
scenario: Admin user navigates to the User Management page to view and manage user accounts
expected_results: Display the complete User Management page with header, search filters, user table, and pagination controls
procedure:
1. Login as admin user with valid credentials
2. Navigate to /admin/users
3. Verify page loads completely
4. Check that header shows 'User Management' title
5. Verify all main sections are visible (header, filters, table, pagination)

description: Verify that non-admin users cannot access the User Management page
scenario: Regular user attempts to access the User Management page without admin privileges
expected_results: User should be redirected to login page or receive access denied message
procedure:
1. Login as regular user (non-admin)
2. Attempt to navigate to /admin/users
3. Verify access is denied
4. Check redirect behavior
5. Confirm proper error handling

description: Verify that the search and filter controls work correctly for finding users
scenario: Admin uses search and filter options to find specific users by username, email, and status
expected_results: Search by username/email returns relevant results, status filters work correctly (All Users, Active Only, Inactive Only, Admins Only)
procedure:
1. Access User Management page as admin
2. Test search functionality with username
3. Test search functionality with email
4. Test each status filter option
5. Verify results update correctly for each filter

description: Verify that the user table displays all user information correctly with proper formatting
scenario: Admin reviews the user table to see all user data including profile avatars, status badges, and timestamps
expected_results: Table displays: User avatar with initial, username, email, status badges (Active/Inactive, Admin), registration date, last login date, and action links
procedure:
1. Navigate to user table section
2. Verify table headers are displayed correctly
3. Check user avatar generation with initials
4. Verify status badges show correct colors and text
5. Confirm date formatting is consistent and readable

description: Verify that pagination controls function correctly for large user datasets
scenario: Admin navigates through multiple pages of users using pagination controls and per-page settings
expected_results: Pagination shows correct page numbers, Previous/Next buttons work, per-page options (25, 50, 100) function correctly
procedure:
1. Locate pagination controls at top and bottom of table
2. Test Previous/Next navigation buttons
3. Change per-page display options (25, 50, 100)
4. Verify page numbers update correctly
5. Check result count displays accurate information

description: Verify that clicking 'View Details' links navigates to individual user detail pages
scenario: Admin clicks on 'View Details' links to access detailed information about specific users
expected_results: Clicking 'View Details' navigates to /admin/user/<user_id> with comprehensive user information
procedure:
1. Locate 'View Details' links in the Actions column
2. Click on a user's 'View Details' link
3. Verify navigation to user details page
4. Check URL contains correct user ID
5. Confirm user details page loads properly

description: Verify that user details page displays comprehensive user information correctly
scenario: Admin views detailed information about a specific user including status, registration, login history, and verification status
expected_results: Display user information panel with status badges, registration date, last login, email verification status, and activity tabs
procedure:
1. Access a user's detail page
2. Verify user information panel displays correctly
3. Check status badges (Active/Inactive, Admin)
4. Verify registration and last login timestamps
5. Confirm email verification status display

description: Verify that admin can toggle user active/inactive status correctly
scenario: Admin uses the toggle status button to activate or deactivate user accounts
expected_results: Status toggle button changes user's active status, updates display, shows confirmation message, prevents self-modification
procedure:
1. Navigate to user details page for a non-admin user
2. Click the Activate/Deactivate User button
3. Verify status changes and button text updates
4. Check success flash message appears
5. Confirm user cannot deactivate their own account

description: Verify that admin can grant or revoke admin privileges for other users
scenario: Admin uses the admin toggle button to grant or revoke administrative privileges
expected_results: Admin toggle button changes user's admin status, updates display, shows confirmation message, prevents self-modification
procedure:
1. Navigate to user details page for a regular user
2. Click the Grant Admin/Revoke Admin button
3. Verify admin status changes and button text updates
4. Check success flash message appears
5. Confirm admin cannot remove their own admin privileges

description: Verify that appropriate empty state messages display when no users match search criteria
scenario: Admin searches for non-existent users or applies filters that return no results
expected_results: Display empty state with appropriate message, clear filters button, and helpful instructions
procedure:
1. Enter search term that returns no results
2. Verify empty state message displays
3. Check 'Clear Filters' button appears when filters are active
4. Test clear filters functionality
5. Verify appropriate messaging for different empty states

description: Verify that the User Management page displays correctly on different screen sizes
scenario: Admin accesses the user management page on various devices and screen resolutions
expected_results: Page layout adapts appropriately to different screen sizes with proper responsive behavior for table, filters, and pagination
procedure:
1. Access page on desktop (1920x1080)
2. Resize browser window to tablet size (768px)
3. Test on mobile viewport (375px)
4. Verify table becomes horizontally scrollable on small screens
5. Check that all controls remain accessible and functional

description: Verify that the User Management page displays correctly in dark mode
scenario: Admin toggles dark mode and verifies all components display with appropriate dark theme styling
expected_results: All sections, table, filters, and controls display with proper dark mode colors and contrast
procedure:
1. Access page in light mode
2. Toggle to dark mode
3. Verify background colors change to dark variants
4. Check text contrast and readability
5. Confirm all interactive elements maintain proper visibility

description: Verify that search queries and filters persist across page navigation and pagination
scenario: Admin applies search filters and navigates through pages to ensure query persistence
expected_results: Search terms and filter selections persist when navigating between pages and returning to user management
procedure:
1. Apply search term and status filter
2. Navigate to next page using pagination
3. Verify search term and filter remain applied
4. Navigate away and return to user management
5. Check if previous search state is maintained

description: Verify that user avatars are generated correctly with initials and proper styling
scenario: Admin reviews user table to ensure avatar generation works consistently for all users
expected_results: Each user displays circular avatar with first letter of username, gradient background, and consistent styling
procedure:
1. Review user table with multiple users
2. Verify each user has avatar with correct initial
3. Check gradient background colors are applied
4. Confirm avatar size and styling consistency
5. Test with usernames starting with different characters

description: Verify that all date and time displays use consistent formatting throughout the user management interface
scenario: Admin reviews various date fields to ensure consistent formatting and timezone handling
expected_results: Registration dates and last login times display in consistent format (MM/DD/YYYY HH:MM) with proper timezone handling
procedure:
1. Review registration dates in user table
2. Check last login times formatting
3. Verify user details page date formatting
4. Confirm 'Never' displays for users who haven't logged in
5. Test with users from different time periods

description: Verify that user status and admin privilege modification actions are protected against CSRF attacks
scenario: Admin modifies user status and privileges to ensure CSRF tokens are properly validated
expected_results: All POST requests for user modifications include CSRF tokens and are validated properly
procedure:
1. Inspect toggle status form for CSRF token
2. Inspect toggle admin form for CSRF token
3. Attempt request without valid CSRF token
4. Verify request is rejected without valid token
5. Confirm successful requests include proper token validation

description: Verify that navigation between user management and user details works correctly with proper back functionality
scenario: Admin navigates between user list and individual user details to test navigation flow
expected_results: Clear navigation paths with 'Back to Dashboard' and proper breadcrumb navigation between list and details views
procedure:
1. Navigate from admin dashboard to user management
2. Click 'Back to Dashboard' button to verify navigation
3. Navigate to user details from user list
4. Test navigation back to user list from details
5. Verify URL structure and browser back button functionality

description: Verify that the user management system handles database errors gracefully
scenario: Admin accesses user management when database connectivity issues occur
expected_results: Appropriate error messages display when database is unavailable, with graceful fallback behavior
procedure:
1. Simulate database unavailability
2. Access user management page
3. Verify appropriate error message displays
4. Check redirect to dashboard occurs
5. Confirm no sensitive error information is exposed

description: Verify that user details activity tabs display relevant user activity information
scenario: Admin reviews user activity tabs including login attempts, email verifications, and contact submissions
expected_results: Activity tabs display login attempts, email verifications, and contact submissions with proper formatting and navigation
procedure:
1. Navigate to user details page
2. Test each activity tab (Login Attempts, Email Verifications, Contact Submissions)
3. Verify content displays correctly in each tab
4. Check tab navigation functionality
5. Confirm data relevance to selected user

description: Verify that per-page parameter validation prevents abuse and maintains valid values
scenario: Admin attempts to manipulate per-page parameters to test input validation
expected_results: Per-page values are restricted to valid options (25, 50, 100) with default fallback for invalid values
procedure:
1. Test valid per-page values (25, 50, 100)
2. Attempt invalid per-page value via URL manipulation
3. Verify system defaults to 25 for invalid values
4. Check dropdown only shows valid options
5. Confirm URL parameters are properly validated

description: Verify that table rows display appropriate hover effects for better user interaction
scenario: Admin hovers over user table rows to test visual feedback and interaction states
expected_results: Table rows highlight on hover with smooth transition effects and clear visual feedback
procedure:
1. Hover over various table rows
2. Verify background color changes on hover
3. Check transition smoothness
4. Test hover effects in both light and dark mode
5. Confirm hover states don't interfere with text readability

description: Verify proper error handling when attempting to access non-existent user details
scenario: Admin attempts to access user details for a user ID that doesn't exist
expected_results: Display appropriate error message and redirect to user list when user is not found
procedure:
1. Navigate to /admin/user/99999 (non-existent user ID)
2. Verify 'User not found' error message displays
3. Check redirect to user management page
4. Test with various invalid user ID formats
5. Confirm proper error handling in all cases

description: Verify that success and error flash messages display correctly for user management actions
scenario: Admin performs various user management actions and observes flash message behavior
expected_results: Appropriate success and error messages appear for user status changes, admin privilege changes, and error conditions
procedure:
1. Toggle user status and verify success message
2. Toggle admin privileges and verify success message
3. Attempt invalid operations and check error messages
4. Verify messages display with proper styling
5. Check message persistence and dismissal behavior

description: Verify that admin users cannot modify their own account status or admin privileges
scenario: Admin attempts to modify their own user account to test security restrictions
expected_results: System prevents admin from deactivating own account or removing own admin privileges with appropriate messaging
procedure:
1. Navigate to own user details page as admin
2. Verify action buttons are disabled or show warning message
3. Attempt to toggle own status via direct URL manipulation
4. Verify error message prevents self-modification
5. Confirm appropriate user interface feedback

description: Verify that page animations and transitions display correctly and enhance user experience
scenario: Admin observes page loading animations and interactive element transitions
expected_results: Smooth fade-in animations for page elements with appropriate timing and visual flow
procedure:
1. Refresh user management page to observe initial animations
2. Verify header animates first, followed by filters and table
3. Check user details page animations
4. Test hover transitions on interactive elements
5. Confirm animations work in both light and dark mode

description: Verify that all user management URLs route correctly and handle invalid parameters
scenario: Admin tests various URL patterns for user management functionality
expected_results: All routes function correctly: /admin/users, /admin/user/<id>, toggle endpoints work with proper validation
procedure:
1. Test /admin/users route directly
2. Test /admin/user/<valid_id> route
3. Test /admin/user/<invalid_id> route
4. Verify POST routes for toggle actions
5. Check URL parameter validation and error handling

description: Verify that user management performs efficiently with large numbers of users
scenario: Admin accesses user management with a large user database to test performance
expected_results: Page loads efficiently with pagination limiting displayed users, search functionality remains responsive
procedure:
1. Test user management with 1000+ users
2. Verify pagination limits displayed users appropriately
3. Test search functionality performance
4. Check filter application speed
5. Monitor page load times and responsiveness

description: Verify that user management functionality works correctly across different web browsers
scenario: Admin accesses user management using various browsers to test compatibility
expected_results: Page displays and functions correctly in Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge with consistent appearance and behavior
procedure:
1. Test user management in Google Chrome
2. Verify functionality in Mozilla Firefox
3. Check compatibility with Safari browser
4. Test in Microsoft Edge
5. Compare appearance and functionality across browsers

description: Verify that admin session management works correctly when accessing user management
scenario: Admin session expires while using user management functionality
expected_results: User is redirected to login when session expires, can return to user management after re-authentication
procedure:
1. Access user management with valid admin session
2. Wait for session to expire or manually clear session
3. Try to perform user management actions
4. Verify redirect to login occurs
5. Re-authenticate and confirm return to user management

description: Verify that user management interface meets accessibility standards for screen readers and keyboard navigation
scenario: Admin uses accessibility tools to test user management compliance with WCAG guidelines
expected_results: Page is fully accessible with proper ARIA labels, keyboard navigation, screen reader compatibility, and color contrast
procedure:
1. Test page with screen reader software
2. Navigate using only keyboard (Tab, Enter, Arrow keys)
3. Verify ARIA labels are present and descriptive
4. Check color contrast ratios meet standards
5. Confirm all interactive elements are accessible
